title: Project-Based Instructional Design and Organizational Training Competency Development

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational knowledge of instructional design concepts and digital tool proficiency
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for corporate trainers and aspiring instructional designers

learning_goals: Learners can independently perform job-related instructional design tasks using project-based learning (PBL).
Learners can design and operate interactive assessment tools (SAIR) using digital devices.
Learners can improve the quality and practical applicability of instructional design outputs by incorporating peer and expert feedback.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
